com.software.reuze

Class a_CellWorldEnvironment

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.software.reuze.aa_a_Environment
      • com.software.reuze.a_CellWorldEnvironment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    aa_i_Environment, aa_i_EnvironmentViewNotifier

    public class a_CellWorldEnvironment
extends aa_a_Environment
    Implementation of the CellContent World Environment, supporting the execution of trials for reinforcement learning agents.
    Author:
    Ciaran O'Reilly

    • Constructor Detail

      • a_CellWorldEnvironment

        public a_CellWorldEnvironment(ga_CellPositionAndContent<Double> startingCell,
                      Set<ga_CellPositionAndContent<Double>> allStates,
                      mp_i_MDPTransitionProbabilityFunction<ga_CellPositionAndContent<Double>,a_CellWorldAction> tpf,
                      m_i_Random r)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        startingCell - the cell that agent(s) are to start from at the beginning of each trial within the environment.
        allStates - all the possible states in this environment.
        tpf - the transition probability function that simulates how the environment is meant to behave in response to an agent action.
        r - a Randomizer used to sample actions that are actually to be executed based on the transition probabilities for actions.
